```{r Load_Packages}

  rio,
  here,

  flextable,

)
```

```{r Load_Data}
table1<-import(here("data", "clean","qPCR"))
```

```{r, eval = FALSE}
base::mean(c(1,2))
```

This is an example report to illustrate how `reportfactory` can be used. It loads the `fs` library purely for demonstration purposes.

```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(fs)
if (params$graph) {
  plot(1:10, 1:10)
} else {
  "No plot here"
}

```

#Exportation
library(finalfit)
write.csv2 (nom_du_fichier, here::here("data", "outpout","nom_du_ficier"), row.names = FALSE)
pdf("nom_de_doc.pdf")
ggplot1
ggplot2
dev.off()
